item.description:
Old Orchard Beach has fireworks every Thursday. We'll meetup for some pier fries, a nice walk on the beach, and watch the fireworks! The great, lazy evening to start the summer off right!

We'll meet at the entrance to the Pier. More details about meeting will be posted closer to the meetup date.

Please give yourself PLENTY of time to allow for parking and walking to where we are meeting.
item.name: Old Orchard Beach - Pier Fries & Fireworks
